description: Minimum set of MCP servers required for custom server support

required.name: Serena
required.rationale: Essential for semantic code understanding when analyzing custom MCP server implementations

required.name: Sequential Thinking
required.rationale: Complex planning and reasoning for custom server integration strategies

required.name: Context7
required.rationale: Up-to-date framework documentation for technologies used by custom servers

recommended.name: Memory (or OpenMemory)
recommended.rationale: Persistent context storage for custom server configurations and learnings

recommended.name: Perplexity Ask
recommended.rationale: Research capabilities for finding custom server documentation and best practices

recommended.name: GitHub Official
recommended.rationale: Access to custom server repositories, issues, and implementation examples

validation.message: All 3 foundation servers (serena, sequentialthinking, context7) must be configured for custom server support
validation.warningMessage: Consider adding more recommended servers for better custom server integration capabilities
